about_the_game:
Enjoy the hot hentai moments of EmyLiveShow: How To Write A Bestseller with this free patch! It adds illustrated sex scenes and nude character sprites to all romance routes.

The patch may include descriptions and illustrations of same-sex relationships and sex, depending on your protagonist's customization.

By downloading the DLC, you are confirming that you are 18 years of age or older (or your local equivalent) and that you wish to view adult content.

The game reveals the topics of: LGBTQ+ friendly, kink, BDSM, dominant, submissive, bondage, edging, male dominance/maledom, male submission, female dominance/femdom, female submission, rough sex‎, semi-public sex, sex toys, oral sex, vaginal sex, urethral play, brief mention of breeding kink, oviposition

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains materials that are not suitable for all ages, not suitable for viewing at work: sex scenes, sex toys usage, same-sex relationships and sex, partial and complete nudity
